name: button
description: button can be used to redefine what the mouse buttons do.

arguments.button: left, middle, right, wheel, double_left, double_middle, double_right, single_left, single_middle, or single_right
arguments.modifiers: None, Shft, Ctrl, CtSh, CtAl, CtAS
arguments.actions: None, Rota, Move, MovZ, Slab, +Box, -Box, Clip, MovS, +/-, PkAt, Pk1, MvSZ, Sele, Orig, Menu, PkAt, Pk1 RotO, MovO, MvOZ, MovA, PkAt, PkTB, MvSZ MvAZ, DrgM, RotZ, PkBd, ClpN, ClpF

notes: Changes made using the button command are easily overridden when the user iterates through the mouse modes. This behavior needs to be changed. Obsolete actions: lb, mb, rb, +lb, +mb, +rb, +lbX, -lbX. Unsupported, Internal, or Future Actions: RotD, MovD, MvDZ, RotF, MovF, MvFZ, TorF, RotV, MovV, MvVZ, DgMZ, DgRT
api: cmd.button(string button, string modifier, string action)
